app.name: PetTouch
dashboard.addNewPetDesc: Register a new pet to your PetTouch account
nfcTags.title: NFC Tags
nfcTags.description: Manage your pet's NFC identification tags
nfcTags.empty.title: No NFC Tags Yet
nfcTags.empty.description: You haven't added any NFC tags yet. Add a tag to link it to one of your pets.
nfcTags.addDialog.title: Add New NFC Tag
nfcTags.addDialog.description: Enter the unique code from your NFC tag and optionally link it to a pet.
nfcTags.editDialog.title: Edit NFC Tag
nfcTags.editDialog.description: Update the pet linked to this NFC tag.
nfcTags.unlinkDialog.title: Unlink NFC Tag
nfcTags.unlinkDialog.description: Are you sure you want to unlink this NFC tag? The tag will remain in your account but won't be associated with any pet.
nfcTags.deleteDialog.title: Delete NFC Tag
nfcTags.deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this NFC tag? This action cannot be undone.
nfcTags.linkDialog.title: Link Pet to NFC Tag
nfcTags.linkDialog.description: Select one of your pets to link to NFC tag: {tagCode}
nfcTags.linkDialog.noPets: You don't have any pets registered yet.
nfcTags.linkDialog.success: Pet linked to NFC tag successfully!
nfcTags.linkDialog.error: Failed to link pet to tag
nfcTags.linkDialog.selectError: Please select a pet to link
nfcTags.qrDialog.title: Tag QR Code
nfcTags.qrDialog.description: Scan this QR code or share the link to access this tag
tagPage.tagNotFoundDesc: The NFC tag you scanned doesn't exist in our system or may have been deactivated.
tagPage.notLinkedYet: This tag is not linked to any pet yet.
tagPage.linkThisTag: Link this tag to one of your pets
tagPage.alreadyLinkedToPet: This tag is already linked to a pet. You can change the pet linked to this tag.
tagPage.linkTagDescription: Connect this tag to your pet's profile to make it easily identifiable when scanned.
tagPage.signInToLink: Sign in to link this tag
tagPage.signInToLinkDesc: You need to sign in to link this NFC tag to your pet.
tagPage.tagClaimed: Tag successfully claimed to your account
tagPage.claimTagDescription: This tag is available. Claim it and link it to one of your pets.
tagPage.tagOwnedByOther: This tag is owned by another user and cannot be claimed.
tagPage.contactAdmin: Only administrators can create new tags. Please contact an administrator if you need assistance.
settings.title: Settings
settings.notificationsComingSoon: Enhanced notification settings will be available soon
store.title: PetTouch Store
store.description: Discover our premium collection of pet identification tags and accessories designed for your beloved companions
store.tryDifferentFilters: Please try different search criteria or reset filters
store.trackYourOrders: Track your orders and view order history
store.tryDifferentFilters: Try different filters or search criteria
store.noOrdersYet: You haven't placed any orders yet
store.faq.q1: How do I track my order?
store.faq.a1: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the Orders section in your dashboard.
store.faq.a2: Yes, all our NFC pet tags are waterproof and designed to withstand everyday pet activities.
store.faq.q3: How long do NFC tags last?
store.faq.a3: Our NFC tags are built to last for years with normal use and have no battery requirements.
store.faq.q4: Can I return items if they don't fit my pet?
store.faq.a4: Yes, we offer a 30-day return policy for unused items in original packaging.
store.shipping.title: Shipping Information
store.shipping.description: We ship to most locations worldwide with various shipping options.
store.returns.title: Returns Policy
store.returns.description: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase.
store.returns.point3: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days
dashboard.upgradePlanDesc: Access premium features and enhanced protection
dashboard.startTracking: Start tracking your pets using Pet Versee NFC tags!
settings.password: Password must be at least 8 characters with a number and special character
auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Log in
auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.signupSuccess: Registration successful! Please check your email for verification
auth.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully
access.adminRequired: Administrator access is required for this page
access.loginRequired: Please log in to access this page
dashboard.upgradePlanRequestSent: Your subscription upgrade request has been submitted. Our team will review it shortly.
payment.proofDescription: Upload a screenshot of your payment confirmation if available
admin.products.title: Products
admin.products.name: Name
admin.products.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
admin.products.noProducts: No products yet. Create your first product!
admin.products.noProductsFound: No products found matching your search
home.hero.subtitle: For Your Furry Friends
home.hero.description: Create digital profiles for your pets, track their health records, set reminders, and connect with the pet community - all in one place
features.title: Our Features
features.subtitle: Discover how PetTouch can help you manage your pet's health, safety, and wellbeing
features.profiles.title: Comprehensive Pet Profiles
features.profiles.description: Create detailed digital profiles for each of your pets, including photos, breed information, medical history, behaviors, dietary needs, and emergency contacts
features.qr.title: QR Code Integration
features.qr.description: Generate unique QR codes for your pets that link to their digital profiles. When scanned, these codes provide instant access to vital information for anyone who finds your pet
features.tracking.title: Scan History Tracking
features.tracking.description: Track when and where your pet's tag was scanned, with instant alerts when a scan occurs
features.community.title: Lost & Found Community
features.community.description: Connect with a network of pet owners in your area to help find lost pets. Post alerts, share sightings, and coordinate search efforts through our community platform
features.tips.title: Pet Care Tips & Resources
features.tips.description: Access a library of expert-approved articles, videos, and resources on pet health, training, nutrition, and behavior to help you provide the best care for your furry friends
testimonials.title: Loved by Pet Owners
testimonials.subtitle: See what our community says about their experience with PetTouch
testimonial.sarah: PetTouch has been a game-changer for managing my dog's health records. I love how easy it is to set reminders for vaccinations!
testimonial.michael: When my cat went missing, the Lost & Found community helped me find her within hours. I'm so grateful for this platform!
testimonial.lisa: As a veterinarian, I recommend PetTouch to all my clients. It helps them stay organized with their pet's health information
cta.title: Ready to Simplify Your Pet Care Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of pet owners who trust PetTouch to manage their pets' health, safety, and wellbeing
footer.description: Your comprehensive pet management platform, connecting pet owners with the resources, community, and care they need
footer.aboutDescription: PetTouch - Your trusted partner in pet identification and safety
footer.newsletterDescription: Subscribe for updates and tips on pet care
admin.products.noProductsFound: No products found matching your search

admin.tags.noTagsMatch: No tags match your search criteria

admin.tags.generateDialog.description: Enter the number of tags you want to generate. Each tag will have a unique code.
admin.tags.deleteDialog.title: Delete NFC Tag
admin.tags.deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this NFC tag? This action cannot be undone.
admin.tags.deleteDialog.warning: Warning: This tag is linked to a pet. Deleting it will remove the connection.
admin.tags.error.count: Please enter a number between 1 and 100
admin.tags.info.qrExport: QR code export functionality will be implemented soon
tagExists: This tag code is already in use. Please use a different code.
tagAdded: New NFC tag has been added successfully
linkCopied: Tag link has been copied to clipboard
